projects.title: myCart - E-commerce Application
projects.description: Built an online shopping website using MERN stack where users can browse products, add items to cart, and complete purchases with secure login and checkout features. Designed the front-end with React to display product pages, search and filter options, and a smooth checkout flow that works well on both phones and computers. Used React Context for managing cart items and user data across different pages, and styled the interface to be clean and easy to use on any device.

projects.title: Restaurant Design Application
projects.description: Created a restaurant website with React that lets customers view menus, make table reservations, and explore different sections of the restaurant. Set up page navigation with React Router and used hooks like useState and useEffect to handle form inputs, button clicks, and loading data from APIs. Styled the website with Tailwind CSS and added animations to make the browsing experience more interactive and visually appealing for users. Used various React libraries for image sliders, form handling, and reusable UI components to keep the code organized and easier to maintain.
